input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Giordana Endurance Conspiracy Vero Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Long Men Assos Campionissimo Winter Cycling Bib Bibs Body Shorts'
  - Name='Boss Men's x Assos X-Frame Pressure-Free Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Urban Liner cycling Shorts'
  - Name='ASSOS Men's EQUIPE RS BIB SHORT'
  - Name='Assos Men's Equipe RS Bib Short S9 | Contender Bicycles Blackseries / XL'
  - Name='Man Sportful Srk Bibshort 1124028'
  - Name='Sportful Pulse Heritage bibshort'
  - Name='Sportful Giara Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura Men's Loop Waist Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Total Comfort Bib Short'
  - Name='Endura Hummvee Short II'
  - Name='ASSOS Men's T. CENTO EVO BIB SHORTS in Black | Size Large'
  - Name='Assos EQUIPE RSR S9 TARGA Cycling Bib Shorts X-Large / Black'
  - Name='Assos Equipe RS S11 bib shorts - Black XXL / Black'
  - Name='Castelli Espresso'
  - Name='Castelli Endurance 3'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Stratos Cargo Bibs'
  - Name='Endura Pro SL Bibtights II Black'
  - Name='Castelli Competizione Limited Edition Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura Men's Hummvee Lite Shorts with Liner'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTO Bib Short'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Bib Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Equipe R Surface S11 Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Giordana Endurance Conspiracy Vero Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High relevancy as it is a bib short focused on endurance, implying similar performance and comfort-oriented features for long rides.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic bib shorts by Assos likely share core features of high-performance cycling bib shorts, similar silhouette and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Long Men Assos Campionissimo Winter Cycling Bib Bibs Body Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While a bib short, this is winter-specific with longer design elements likely for cold weather, differing from the versatile all-climate Pro Delta Bib.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Boss Men's x Assos X-Frame Pressure-Free Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end bib shorts with pressure-free design suggest high performance and comfort similar to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Urban Liner cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: As liners rather than full bib shorts, these serve a different function and construction hence less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Men's EQUIPE RS BIB SHORT
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Top-tier bib shorts from Assos clearly targeting elite performance cycling, very similar in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Equipe RS Bib Short S9 | Contender Bicycles Blackseries / XL
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above, high performance bib shorts directly comparable to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Srk Bibshort 1124028
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sportful SRK bib shorts are high quality performance bib shorts, very relevant but possibly less feature-rich than top Assos or Pedal Mafia models.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Pulse Heritage bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Heritage model implies traditional design with decent performance but might lack advanced technologies of the reference bib.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Giara Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance-focused bib shorts suitable for endurance rides, close in function and construction to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Loop Waist Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Waist shorts without bib straps differ in silhouette and possibly comfort, thus less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Total Comfort Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed for comfort but still a bib short; quite relevant though possibly less technical than Pro Delta.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Hummvee Short II
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-bib shorts more oriented to mountain biking or casual cycling; very different from road bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Men's T. CENTO EVO BIB SHORTS in Black | Size Large
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance Assos bib shorts designed for racing or endurance, very similar type of product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos EQUIPE RSR S9 TARGA Cycling Bib Shorts X-Large / Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Top-level bib shorts from Assos, analogous in features and usage as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe RS S11 bib shorts - Black XXL / Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Latest generation of high-end bib shorts matching the premium performance criteria of the reference bib.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Espresso
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Castelli Espresso is a bib short aimed at endurance riders; relevant though possible differences in padding and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Endurance 3
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specifically for endurance, high-quality bib shorts from Castelli, very relevant to the Pro Delta Bib.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Stratos Cargo Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts with cargo features suggest a slightly different usage; still bib shorts but possibly heavier or less race-focused.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Pro SL Bibtights II Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bibtights suggest longer leg coverage and possibly insulation, differing moderately from short bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Competizione Limited Edition Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end Castelli bib shorts aimed at competition; very relevant in performance and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Hummvee Lite Shorts with Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts with liner likely less constructed than bib shorts, primarily casual or MTB use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTO Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance-focused bib short from Assos, designed for long rides; highly relevant though possibly less technical than EQUIPE line.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Pro Bib Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance pro level bib shorts comparable in function and design to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Equipe R Surface S11 Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Latest Assos top-tier bib short set, nearly identical product class and target use as the reference.
